title: Handle Carrier Late Arrival for Pickup
description: A carrier scheduled for a pickup is running late. The shipping manager must assess the impact.

tasks.description: Receive a call from a carrier stating they will be 2 hours late for a pickup.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the carrier's ETA update.

tasks.description: Check the delivery requirements for the shipment to see if the delay will cause a missed appointment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the delivery is to a retail DC with a strict appointment time, which will now be missed.

tasks.description: Contact the receiving facility to reschedule the delivery appointment for the next day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reschedules the delivery to avoid refusal and fees.
